attributes.action: Continue to oppose the death penalty for juvenile offenders in Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Protest the exevution of Delara Darabi

Where: Embassy of the Islamic Republic of Iran, 16 Prince's Gate London SW7 1PT

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
